34 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE
35  #define SAFE_DELETE(p) { if(p) { delete (p); (p) = nullptr; } }
36 #endif
37 
38 #ifndef SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY
39  #define SAFE_DELETE_ARRAY(p) { if(p) { delete [] (p); (p) = nullptr; } }
40 #endif

160 
161 
162 enum class ResourceBehaviorFlag {
163  kRemovable = (1 << 0), // By default, resource is never deleted. If flagged, can be removed to save memory
164  kChild = (1 << 1), // Is a child resource, i.e., is loaded in along with a parent resource
165  kParent = (1 << 2), // Is a parent resource, i.e., is loaded along with child resources
166  kRuntimeGenerated = (1 << 3), // The resource has no path associated with it, i.e., it is not loaded from a file
167  kCore = (1 << 4), // Is a core resource, will not be remove, no matter what, and won't save to file. Overrides removable flag
168  kUnsaved = (1 << 5), // If unsaved, will not be saved to file
169  kUsesJson = (1 << 6) // Whether or not the resource uses JSON for initialization
170 };
171 MAKE_BITWISE(ResourceBehaviorFlag);
172 MAKE_FLAGS(ResourceBehaviorFlag, ResourceBehaviorFlags)
173 
174 enum class ResourceStatusFlag {
175  kConstructed = (1 << 0), // Resource was successfully constructed
176  //kDelete = (1 << 1), // Resource on queue for deletion
177  kIsLoading = (1 << 2) // Whether or not the source is loading
178 };
179 MAKE_BITWISE(ResourceStatusFlag);
180 MAKE_FLAGS(ResourceStatusFlag, ResourceStatusFlags)
181 
182 enum class ResourceDeleteFlag {
183  kDeleteHandle = (1 << 0), // Removes handle from resource cache entirely
184  kForce = (1 << 1) // Force deletion of a resource, even if it is flagged as permanent
185 };
186 MAKE_BITWISE(ResourceDeleteFlag);
187 MAKE_FLAGS(ResourceDeleteFlag, ResourceDeleteFlags)
188 
189 
190 class ResourceHandle: public Object, public Identifiable, public Nameable, public DistributedLoadable{
194 public:
195  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
198 
200  static GString getNameFromJson(const QJsonObject& json);
201 
203  static std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> create(CoreEngine* engine, const QJsonObject& json);
204  static std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> create(CoreEngine* engine, ResourceType type);
205  static std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> create(CoreEngine* engine, ResourceType type,
206  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags);
207  static std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> create(CoreEngine* engine, const GString& filepath, ResourceType type);
208  static std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> create(CoreEngine* engine, const GString& filepath, ResourceType type,
209  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags);
210 
212 
213  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
216  ~ResourceHandle();
218 
219  //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
222 
223  const ResourceStatusFlags statusFlags() const {
224  return (ResourceStatusFlags)m_statusFlags.load();
225  }
226  void setStatusFlags(ResourceStatusFlags statusFlags) {
227  m_statusFlags.store((uint32_t)statusFlags);
228  }
229 
230  const ResourceBehaviorFlags behaviorFlags() const {
231  return (ResourceBehaviorFlags)m_behaviorFlags.load();
232  }
233  void setBehaviorFlags(ResourceBehaviorFlags behaviorFlags) {
234  m_behaviorFlags.store((uint32_t)behaviorFlags);
235  }
236 
238  bool isChild() const {
239  return behaviorFlags().testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kChild);
240  }
241  void setChild(bool isChild) {
242  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
243  flags.setFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kChild, isChild);
244  setBehaviorFlags(flags);
245  }
246  bool isRuntimeGenerated() const {
247  return behaviorFlags().testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kRuntimeGenerated);
248  }
249  void setRuntimeGenerated(bool pathless) {
250  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
251  flags.setFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kRuntimeGenerated, pathless);
252  setBehaviorFlags(flags);
253  }
254 
256  bool usesJson() const {
257  return behaviorFlags().testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kUsesJson) || isRuntimeGenerated();
258  }
259  void setUsesJson(bool uses) {
260  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
261  flags.setFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kUsesJson, uses);
262  setBehaviorFlags(flags);
263  }
264 
265  bool isCore() const {
266  return behaviorFlags().testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kCore);
267  }
268  void setCore(bool isCore) {
269  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
270  flags.setFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kCore, isCore);
271  setBehaviorFlags(flags);
272  }
273  bool isPermanent() const {
274  return !behaviorFlags().testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kRemovable);
275  }
276  bool isRemovable() const {
277  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
278  return flags.testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kRemovable) && !flags.testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kCore);
279  }
280  void setRemovable(bool toggle) {
281  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
282  flags.setFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kRemovable, toggle);
283  setBehaviorFlags(flags);
284  }
285  bool isUnsaved() const {
286  // Won't be saved if core or if explicitly flagged unsaved
287  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
288  return flags.testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kUnsaved) || flags.testFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kCore);
289  }
290  void setUnsaved(bool toggle) {
291  ResourceBehaviorFlags flags = behaviorFlags();
292  flags.setFlag(ResourceBehaviorFlag::kUnsaved, toggle);
293  setBehaviorFlags(flags);
294  }
295 
297  bool isLoading() const {
298  return statusFlags().testFlag(ResourceStatusFlag::kIsLoading);
299  }
300  void setIsLoading(bool isLoading) {
301  ResourceStatusFlags flags = statusFlags();
302  flags.setFlag(ResourceStatusFlag::kIsLoading, isLoading);
303  setStatusFlags(flags);
304  }
305 
306  bool isConstructed() const {
307  return statusFlags().testFlag(ResourceStatusFlag::kConstructed);
308  }
309 
310  void setConstructed(bool constructed) {
311 #ifdef DEBUG_MODE
312  if (constructed) {
313  if (!isLoading())
314  {
315  Logger::Throw("Error, set constructed flag before loading flag");
316  }
317  }
318 #endif
319  ResourceStatusFlags flags = statusFlags();
320  flags.setFlag(ResourceStatusFlag::kConstructed, constructed);
321  flags.setFlag(ResourceStatusFlag::kIsLoading, false);
322  setStatusFlags(flags);
323  }
324 
326  QMutex& mutex() { return m_resourceMutex; }
327 
329  CoreEngine* engine() const { return m_engine; }
330 
332  bool needsReload() const { return !m_resource && !isLoading(); }
333 
335  const QJsonObject& resourceJson() const { return m_resourceJson; };
336  //QJsonObject& resourceJson() { return m_resourceJson; };
337  void setResourceJson(const QJsonObject& object) { m_resourceJson = object; }
338 
340  ResourceType getResourceType() const { return m_type; }
341  void setResourceType(ResourceType type) { m_type = type; }
342 
344  inline Resource* resource() const {
345 #ifdef DEBUG_MODE
346  if (m_resource) {
347  if (m_resource->getResourceType() != m_type) {
348  Logger::Throw("Error, resource somehow has the incorrect type");
349  }
350  }
351 #endif
352 
353  if (needsReload()) {
354  notifyForReload();
355  }
356 
357  //if (lockMutex) {
358  // m_resourceMutex.unlock();
359  //}
360  return m_resource.get();
361  }
362 
364  void setResource(std::unique_ptr<Resource> resource, bool lockMutex);

367  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle>>& children() { return m_children; }
368  const std::vector<std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle>>& children() const { return m_children; }
369 
371  ResourceHandle* parent() { return m_parent; }

420  template<typename T>
421  T* resourceAs() const {
422  //static_assert(std::is_base_of_v<Resource, T>, "Can only convert to resource types");
423  //if constexpr (std::is_base_of_v<Resource, T>) {
424  // // Perform compile-time conversion if possible
425  // return static_cast<T*>(resource(lockMutex));
426  //}
427  //else {
428  // Dynamic cast is necessary for properly verifying polymorphism (see how a reinterpret_cast breaks things)
429  return dynamic_cast<T*>(resource());
430  //}
431  }
